email_text:
Subject: Exclusive Crypto Investment Opportunity from Coinbase

Dear valued customer,

We are excited to offer you an exclusive investment opportunity in a new cryptocurrency that is set to revolutionize the market. Our team of experts at Coinbase has carefully analyzed this project and we believe it has the potential to deliver massive returns in a short period of time.

By investing in this cryptocurrency now, you will be able to capitalize on its growth and secure your financial future. The best part is, this opportunity is only available to a select group of investors, and we are pleased to extend this offer to you.

To participate in this exclusive investment opportunity, all you need to do is transfer a minimum of $1000 to the provided wallet address. Once your investment is confirmed, you will start earning passive income from the growth of this cryptocurrency.

Don't miss out on this chance to make significant profits in the crypto market. Act now and take advantage of this limited-time offer from Coinbase.

Thank you for being a loyal customer and we look forward to helping you achieve your financial goals.

Sincerely,
The Coinbase Team
